text: Motion
Motion
Mom, I'm off!

Well then, we're off too......
Here we go......!
Mom seemed really kind.

Yes, she's very kind!
But when she's angry, she's really scary......

But today, she made rice balls for us again, saying
"Eat after self-training"! There's some for everyone too!

Huh, seriously!?
I forgot to thank her......

We'll tell...
her when we get back......

Yeah. Hey, Kaho, if there's a bento in there
too, do you want me to carry it for you?

I'm okay! Because heroes fight with
weights until they're in a pinch!

Yes...
Hawks, cats, and heroes too......

Those who are capable...
should conceal their claws......

Y-Yeah...
...No, it feels a bit off...
I'm home~!

Welcome back, Kaho.
...Today is 'I'm home', isn't it?

──Ah
Hehe, I made a mistake......

It's not a mistake. It's fine when
you're coming back to the office.

I'm home......
I'm back......

Ah
Welcome back, Juri and Rinze
